home.heading: One app. Whole building.
home.about: Multi-family building internet-connected access control system.

login.heading: Create account. Or Sign in.
login.description: You will receive a magic login link via Email.

failure.heading: Sorry, Failed to sign in!
failure.about: This magic link is no longer active.

success.heading: Success ðŸŽ‰ Magic E-mail sent!
success.about: You can safely close this page now.

error.heading: Sorry, You don't belong to any organizations yet!

users.title: Residents
users.subheading: This page allows you to invite new residents.

create.subheading: Edit or create a new member of organisation.

basic.description: Annotation could include the unit, name, or any other information for a quick search.
basic.isadmin: Administrator - Should be able to manage organisation?
basic.destription: Action will delete the resident from an active organisation.

manage.subheader: Actions on this resident include deactivation.

groups.title: Groups
groups.subheading: This page allows you to create new groups.

create.subheading: Edit or create a new member of organisation.

basic.description: The name allows you to find this group.
basic.destription: Action will delete the group from an active organisation.

devices.title: Devices
devices.subheading: This page allows you to create new devices.

basic.description: The name allows you to find this device on site.

create.subheading: Modify a device in the organization.
create.shadows: Device shadows will be created automatically.
